roleset.name: redesignate an area for a new use
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, zone.01. No VNcls.

example.name: all args
example.text: The Capitol Neighborhoods Inc 's Alcohol Issues Task Force is on record in support of *PRO* re-zoning the downtown as " residential neighborhood after 6 p.m. or maybe it is 8 p.m. -RRB- .
example.arg: as "residential neighborhood after 6 p.m. or maybe it is 8 p.m.
